TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit FilePicker extends System.Object
public ref class FilePicker abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Lets the user pick a file from the device's storage.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Default As IFilePicker
public: static property Microsoft::Maui::Storage::IFilePicker ^ Default { Microsoft::Maui::Storage::IFilePicker ^ get(); };
.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.Maui.Storage.FileResult> PickAsync(class Microsoft.Maui.Storage.PickOptions options) cil managed
Public Shared Function PickAsync (Optional options As PickOptions = Nothing) As Task(Of FileResult)

Docs.param: File picker options to use; may be null
Docs.summary: Starts file picker for selecting files.
Docs.returns: File picking result object, or null when picking was cancelled by the user.
Docs.remarks: File types can be specified in order to limit files that can be selected, using a PickOptions object. Note that this method may re-throw platform specific exceptions that occured during file picking. When calling PickAsync() again while showing a file picker, the Task object that was returned from the first call is cancelled. Be sure to also handle the TaskCanceledException in this case.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.Maui.Storage.FileResult>> PickMultipleAsync(class Microsoft.Maui.Storage.PickOptions options) cil managed
Public Shared Function PickMultipleAsync (Optional options As PickOptions = Nothing) As Task(Of IEnumerable(Of FileResult))

Docs.param: File picker options to use; may be null
Docs.summary: Starts file picker for selecting a single file.
Docs.returns: File picking result object, or null when picking was cancelled by the user.
Docs.remarks: File types can be specified in order to limit files that can be selected, using a PickOptions object. Note that this method may re-throw platform specific exceptions that occured during file picking. When calling PickMultipleAsync() again while showing a file picker, the Task object that was returned from the first call is cancelled. Be sure to also handle the TaskCanceledException in this case.
